### Adding options to Motion options to highcharts objects

#### Description 

The Motion Highcharts Plugin adds an interactive HTML5 player to any Highcharts chart (High-
charts, Highmaps and Highstock).

#### Usage
<pre><code>
hc_motion(hc, ...)
</code></pre>

#### Arguments 

* ``hc ``: A highchart htmlwidget object.
* ``...``: Arguments defined in https://github.com/larsac07/Motion-Highcharts-Plugin/wiki.
